text: But my patriotism goes for something beyond what we have. We don't have something that I want to die for - anymore.
author: Jack Bowman

text: One tell-tale sign of a Wingnut: they always confuse partisanship with patriotism.
author: John Avlon

text: True patriotism isn't cheap. It's about taking on a fair share of the burden of keeping America going.
author: Robert Reich

text: If terror groups are to be defeated, it is national governments that will have to do so. In nations like India, governments will have to call on the patriotism of citizens to fight the terrorists. In a nation like Pakistan, the government will have to be persuaded to deal with those in their midst who are complicit.
author: Bill Kristol

text: Patriotism is an indispensable weapon in the defense of civilization against barbarism.
author: Bill Kristol
